TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerRegion extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject

summary.span: 为关联控件定义设计时标记内的内容区域。

span.span: Defines a region of content within the design-time markup for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示由实现生成的设计时标记内的内容区域。The object represents a region of content within the design-time markup that is generated by a implementation. 控件开发人员使用自定义实现中的设计器区域为关联控件定义设计时标记内的单独区域, 并为区域提供编辑和事件处理。A control developer uses designer regions in a custom implementation to define separate areas within the design-time markup for the associated control and to provide editing and event handling for the area. 可视化设计器 (如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) 可以使用设计器区域在设计图面上显示控件的不同区域, 并将区域的用户事件引发到控件设计器。A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], can use designer regions to display the separate areas of a control on the design surface and to raise user events for the region to the control designer. 设计器区域可以简化控件设计器的实现, 因为许多基于区域的功能由基本设计器类和可视化设计器提供。Designer regions can simplify a control designer implementation because many region-based features are provided by the base designer classes and the visual designer. 类提供设计器区域的基本功能, 例如, 可以单击、选择和突出显示设计图面中的某个区域。The class provides the base functionality for designer regions, such as the ability to click, select, and highlight a region in the design surface. 使用控件设计器实现中的对象定义不需要编辑的区域。Use a object in a control designer implementation to define a region that does not require editing. 在设计时使用控件设计器实现中的派生类定义具有可编辑内容的区域。Use the derived class in a control designer implementation to define a region with editable content at design time. 使用控件设计器实现中的派生类定义表示控件中的模板的可编辑区域。Use the derived class in a control designer implementation to define an editable region that represents a template in a control. 若要支持派生自的类中的区域, 请重写方法, 并将一个或多个初始化的对象添加到集合中。To support regions within a class that is derived from the , override the method and add one or more initialized objects to the collection. 或者, 您可以通过重写方法来处理设计图面上的区域中的鼠标单击。Optionally, you can handle mouse clicks in the regions on the design surface by overriding the method. 使用对象的属性来确定可视化设计器显示区域的方式。Use the properties of a object to determine how the region is displayed by the visual designer. 重写属性, 以指示用户可以在设计图面上选择该区域。Override the property to indicate that the region can be selected by the user on the design surface. 使用属性在可视化设计器中突出显示设计器区域; 例如, 您可以在用户单击选择某个区域之后突出显示该区域。Use the property to highlight the designer region in the visual designer; for example, you can highlight a region after a user has clicked to select it. 使用和属性来存储或检索有关区域的其他详细信息。Use the and properties to store or retrieve additional details about the region. 具体而言, 当用户将鼠标指针移到设计器区域上时, 可视化设计器会使用属性来显示工具提示信息。In particular, the property is used by the visual designer to display ToolTip information when the user moves the mouse pointer over the designer region. 使用属性可访问包含设计器区域的控件设计器对象的方法和属性。Use the property to access the methods and properties of the control designer object that contains the designer region.

related.span: 扩展设计时支持

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

summary.span: 为设计器区域定义 HTML 特性名称。

span.span: Defines the HTML attribute name for a designer region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器区域的属性名称是`_designerRegion`。The attribute name for a designer region is `_designerRegion`. 字段用于标识控件设计器的设计时 HTML 标记内的区域。The field is used to identify regions within the design-time HTML markup for the control designer.

summary.span: 获取或设置可选用户数据，以关联设计器区域。

span.span: Gets or sets optional user data to associate with the designer region.

value.span: 一个对象，它包含为设计器区域存储的用户数据。

span.span: An object that contains user data stored for the designer region.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控件设计器实现中, 使用属性存储或检索设计器区域的其他信息。Within a control designer implementation, use the property to store or retrieve additional information for the designer region. 例如, 如果控件设计器实现支持从多个设计器区域中进行选择, 则可以使用控件设计器中的属性为每个区域存储唯一索引。For example, if the control designer implementation supports selecting from multiple designer regions, you can use the property in a control designer to store a unique index for each region. 然后, 可以使用传递给方法的区域的属性来存储当前所选区域的索引。You can then use the property for the region that is passed into the method to store the index for the currently selected region.

related.span: 扩展设计时支持

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

related.span: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode
